channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- Content Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP -- Content Server

item.title: CVE-2023-26457|2024-08-02T11:53:53.766Z -- sap -- content%20server
item.description: SAP Content Server - version 7.53, does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. After successful exploitation, an attacker can read and modify some sensitive information but cannot delete the data.
